mapper.sql: id, tid, supplier_id, order_id, start_code, end_code, sail_time, voyage_day, unit, create_time
mapper.select: select t.id,t.tid,t.supplier_id,t.order_id,t.start_code,t.end_code,t.sail_time,t.voyage_day,t.unit,t.create_time,t.task_id,t.operation_team_id,t.user_id,t.user_name, t1.code_name tname, t2.company_name supplierName, t3.code_name startName, t4.code_name endName, t5.code_name taskName, t6.group_name operationTeamName, CONCAT(t3.code_name,'/',t4.code_name) startEndName, CONCAT(t3.code_name,'--',t4.code_name) shipRoute, (case t.unit when '1' then concat(t.voyage_day,' 小时') when '2' then concat(t.voyage_day,' 天') when '3' then concat(t.voyage_day,' 月') else null end) as crudingRrange from ocean_bill t left join transport_way t1 on t1.id = t.tid left join supplier_info t2 on t2.id = t.supplier_id left join harbour_info t3 on t3.id_code = t.start_code left join harbour_info t4 on t4.id_code = t.end_code left join task_group t5 on t5.id = t.task_id left join operation_team t6 on t6.id = t.operation_team_id where t.id=#{id}

select t.id,t.order_no,t.actual_weight,t.actual_volume,t.charge_weight,t2.supplier_id,t2.quantity,t3.company_name supplierName from order_info t join ( select t.supplier_id,t3.order_id,count(t3.order_id) quantity from (select id,supplier_id from ocean_bill where id = #{id}) t join ocean_counter t1 on t1.ob_id = t.id join counter_case t2 on t2.ocean_counter_id = t1.id join order_case t3 on t3.id = t2.order_case_id group by t3.order_id ) t2 on t2.order_id = t.id left join supplier_info t3 on t3.id = t2.supplier_id

select t.id,t.tid,t.supplier_id,t.order_id,t.start_code,t.end_code,t.sail_time,t.voyage_day,t.unit,t.create_time,t.task_id,t.operation_team_id,t.user_id,t.user_name, t1.code_name tname, t2.company_name supplierName, t3.code_name startName, t4.code_name endName, t5.group_name taskName, t6.group_name operationTeamName, CONCAT(t3.code_name,'/',t4.code_name) startEndName from ocean_bill t left join transport_way t1 on t1.id = t.tid left join supplier_info t2 on t2.id = t.supplier_id left join harbour_info t3 on t3.id_code = t.start_code left join harbour_info t4 on t4.id_code = t.end_code left join task_group t5 on t5.id = t.task_id left join operation_team t6 on t6.id = t.operation_team_id where 1=1 and t.id = #{obId}

select t.id,t.ocean_bill_id,t.task_code,t.task_name,t.sort,t.days,t.day_flag,t.operators,t.minutes,t.score,t.remarks,t.status,t.reason,t.up_time,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time from bill_task_relevance t where t.ocean_bill_id = #{obId}

select t.up_time,t.operators, CONCAT('点击【',t.task_name, '】任务,',statusDescribes) operateDescribes from ( select up_time,operators,task_name, (case status when '0' then '未激活' when '1' then '已激活' when '2' then '异常' when '3' then '已完成' else null end) as statusDescribes from bill_task_relevance where 1=1 and up_time is not null and ocean_bill_id=#{id} ) t order by t.up_time desc
